welcome.messageWelcome:
This wizard guides you through the setup and tries to be helpful with the most important settings.
Do you want to use your shop in a different language and reach customers in other countries? Then simply install the desired language packs here.
welcome.switchLanguageMessage: "{pluginName}" has been installed successfully. Would you like to change your interface language?
welcome.pluginsInstalledMessage: Language plugin has been installed: | These language plugins have been installed:
welcome.pluginNotFoundMessage: The language plugin {languageName} could not be found.
welcome.noConnectionMessage: There seem to be connection issues, the language could not be installed.

dataImport.messageDemoData: Start exploring Shopware 6 by adding a set of demo data. Demo data gives the impression of a fully working shop, but should strictly be used for testing purposes only.
dataImport.messageMigration: The Migration Assistant helps you connect to and transfer data from a previous shop system right into your new Shopware 6 environment.
dataImport.loadingMessage:
Installing plugin
This may take a while...

mailerSelection.headline: Establishing email communication
mailerSelection.description: Communicating with customers is a key factor in everyday ecommerce. Consequently, setting up a mailing scheme should be crossed out from your list as soon as possible.
mailerSelection.localOptionHelptext: This option uses your systemâ€˜s default mailer (Sendmail).  Make sure Sendmail works and is available in your own hosting environment.
mailerSelection.configurationNote: Mailing configurations can be edited later.

paypalInfo.headline: Now pre-integrated in Shopware with even easier and faster activation of the most popular payment methods*
paypalInfo.disclaimerLineTwo: ** subject to a positive risk assessment by PayPal

paypalInstall.loadingMessage:
Configuring PayPal
This may take a while...

recommendedPlugins.headline: Our recommendations
recommendedPlugins.message: Here is a selection of useful extensions for your shop. Select a region that is relevant for you, first. Then you can browse through different categories.

shopwareAccount.headline: Shopware Account
shopwareAccount.message:
Sign up now with your Shopware ID to have access to purchased plugins and licenses.

With your Shopware ID you are able to log into even more Shopware platforms such as Community Store, the forum or your personal Shopware account.
shopwareAccount.registerAccountText: You don't have a Shopware ID yet? Sign up right away!

error.messageLoginDataInvalid: Login credentials incorrect, please try again.

shopwareDomain.headline: Verify your domain
shopwareDomain.message: Which domain do you want to link this shop? Select a valid domain or create a new one.

finish.loadingMessage:
Restarting application
This may take a while...
